content.text:
# List of presidents of the Philippines by previous executive experience__disambig_1

This is a list of the current and former Philippine presidents by previous executive experience before they became president of the Philippines. Executive experience is defined as having been something where one is the top decision-maker in a company, a regional constituency, a military unit, or something similar. Positions like army general, governor, vice governor, mayor, vice mayor, vice president, and chief executive officer are included, but not limited to just that.
{| class="wikitable"
! Order !! President !! Previous executive experience
|-

|-

|-

|-

|-

|-
| 7 || Ramon Magsaysay || Military Governor of Zambales, Secretary of National Defense
|-
| 8 || Carlos P. Garcia || Governor of Bohol, Vice President of the Philippines
|-

|-

|-
